statements: SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_date FROM satellite_imagery;
SELECT city_name, resolution FROM satellite_imagery ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT sensor_type, resolution, capture_date FROM satellite_imagery ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT city_name, sensor_type, resolution FROM satellite_imagery WHERE resolution > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery WHERE city_name = 'New York' ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT image_id, capture_date, sensor_type FROM satellite_imagery WHERE resolution > 1.5 ORDER BY capture_date ASC
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM satellite_imagery WHERE sensor_type = 'IR' AND city_name LIKE 'Los%' LIMIT 5
SELECT city_name, COUNT(*) FROM satellite_imagery GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery;
SELECT image_id, location FROM satellite_imagery WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, ST_AsText(location) AS location_text FROM satellite_imagery WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT monitoring_id, monitoring_result->>'urban_area' AS urban_area FROM urban_sprawl_monitoring WHERE monitoring_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT monitoring_id, monitoring_date, monitoring_result FROM urban_sprawl_monitoring ORDER BY monitoring_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT image_id, timestamp FROM satellite_imagery WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM urban_sprawl_monitoring WHERE monitoring_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY monitoring_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT monitoring_id, monitoring_result FROM urban_sprawl_monitoring ORDER BY monitoring_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM satellite_imagery WHERE image_id = 'abc123'
SELECT * FROM satellite_images
SELECT area_name, population FROM urban_areas
SELECT image_name, capture_date, resolution FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution > 1.5
SELECT area_name, area_size FROM urban_areas WHERE population > 1000000
SELECT * FROM image_metadata
SELECT * FROM satellite_images ORDER BY capture_date DESC, resolution ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_name, capture_date FROM satellite_images WHERE resolution > 2.0;
SELECT urban_areas.area_name, urban_areas.population, image_metadata.capture_time FROM urban_areas JOIN image_metadata ON urban_areas.area_id = image_metadata.metadata_id ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT area_name FROM urban_areas WHERE population > 1000000;
SELECT image_name, capture_date, image_quality FROM satellite_images JOIN image_metadata ON satellite_images.image_id = image_metadata.image_id WHERE image_metadata.image_quality = 'HD';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_name, image_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_resolution IS NOT NULL;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM Satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT image_name, image_date, satellite_name, location_name FROM SatelliteImages JOIN Satellites ON SatelliteImages.id = Satellites.id JOIN Locations ON SatelliteImages.id = Locations.id;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_name, image_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_resolution = 'High';
SELECT * FROM Satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT image_name, satellite_name, location_name FROM SatelliteImages JOIN Satellites ON SatelliteImages.id = Satellites.id JOIN Locations ON SatelliteImages.id = Locations.id;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_date FROM satellite_images ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM image_metadata WHERE sensor_type = 'Lidar';
SELECT image_id, label_name, confidence_level FROM image_labels WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT annotation_content, reviewed_by, review_date FROM image_annotations WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellite_images ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT image_url, location, resolution FROM satellite_images WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT image_id, capture_date, resolution FROM satellite_images WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT image_id, satellite_name, sensor_type, cloud_coverage FROM image_metadata WHERE cloud_coverage > 0.5 ORDER BY cloud_coverage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_id, annotation_content, reviewed_by, review_date FROM image_annotations WHERE reviewed_by = 'John Doe' ORDER BY review_date ASC;
